com.bws.jdistil.core.security
Interface ISecurityManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultSecurityManager
public interface ISecurityManager

Interface defining methods required by a Security Manager.

Author:
- Bryan Snipes

Method Summary
 IDomain getDomain(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
          Returns a user's domain.
 boolean isAuthenticated(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
          Returns a value indicating whether or not a user has been authenticated.
 boolean isAuthorizationRequired(java.lang.String actionId, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
          Indicates whether or not authorization is required for a given action ID.
 boolean isAuthorized(java.lang.String actionId, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
          Indicates whether or not the current user is authorized to perform a given action.
 boolean isDomainAdmin(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
          Returns a value indicating whether or not a user is a domain admin.
 boolean isFieldHidden(java.lang.String fieldId, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
          Indicates whether or not a given field is hidden.
 boolean isFieldReadOnly(java.lang.String fieldId, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
          Indicates whether or not a given field is read only.
